data.title: Bitcoin Braced For A Huge December Fed Game-Changer As $6.6 Trillion Flip Predicted To Trigger Price Shock
data.description: Some of the most bullish bitcoin and crypto speculators have said they expect a December Federal Reserve bombshell to power a bitcoin price boom...
data.author: Billy Bambrough
data.keywords: bitcoin,bitcoin price,crypto,bitcoin price prediction,Fed,Federal Reserve,Jerome Powell
